Author: exh_ust_d
Text: I agree that your co-workers are being stupid, but I have a pretty big issue with your use of the term 'fat-logic'.   Fat people can experience EDs just as much as anyone else and using fat as a derogatory term isn't okay and is honestly kind of triggering and shitty.
